Description:
For over a century, the Quaker<sup>®</sup> brand has served as a symbol of quality, great taste and nutrition; providing the whole grain goodness of oats in a power-packed line of popular products from oatmeal to cereals and snack bars. Whether you are enjoying steel cut, quick or instant oats, they are made with 100% whole grain oats, low in saturated fat, contain 0 trans-fat and are part of a nutritious diet.

Take a look through time at the moments that helped shape the Quaker<sup>®</sup> name into what it is today.
